item.title: @elonmusk: This despicably misleading headline is exactly why the American people have completely lost faith in...
item.description: This despicably misleading headline is exactly why the American people have completely lost faith in the mainstream media. This journalist knows the facts, was given the truth, and adamantly refuses to report it. Here are the facts: At 6:50 PM CT, federal law enforcement officers were conducting a targeted traffic stop in Minneapolis of an illegal alien from Venezuela who was released into the country by Joe Biden in 2022. In an attempt to evade arrest, the subject fled the scene in his vehicle and crashed into a parked car. The subject then fled on foot. The law enforcement officer caught up to the subject on foot and attempted to apprehend him when the subject began to resist and violently assault the officer. While the subject and law enforcement were in a struggle on the ground, two subjects came out of a nearby apartment and also attacked the law enforcement officer with a snow shovel and broom handle. As the officer was being ambushed and attacked by the two individuals, the original subject got loose and began striking the officer with a shovel or broom stick. Fearing for his life and safety as he was being ambushed by three individuals, the officer fired a defensive shot to defend his life. The initial subject was hit in the leg. All three subjects ran back into the apartment and barricaded themselves inside. The attacked officer and subject are both in the hospital. Both attackers are in custody.

item.description: UPDATE FROM ğ• SAFETY TEAM ğŸ”’ ğ• has shared new safety updates regarding Grok image generation New Grok image safeguards: â€¢ Editing images of real people in revealing clothing (e.g. bikinis) is now blocked â€¢ Applies to all users, including paid subscribers â€¢ Image creation & editing on ğ• via Grok is now paid-only, improving accountability Enforcement actions: â€¢ Zero tolerance for child sexual exploitation, CSAM, non-consensual nudity, or unwanted sexual content â€¢ High-priority violations are removed immediately â€¢ Accounts involved in CSAM are reported to law enforcement and banned Geoblocking update: â€¢ Image generation of real people in bikinis, underwear, or similar attire is geoblocked in regions where itâ€™s illegal ğ• Rules still apply to everyone Regardless of how content is created AI or manual, free or paid - all posts must comply with ğ• Rules Violations lead to removals, permanent suspensions, and cooperation with authorities when required ğ• says generative AI is evolving fast, and safety systems will continue to tighten, working with users, governments, and industry partners to address issues as they emerge Clear rules....Strong enforcement...No exceptions

item.title: @elonmusk: It always amazes me that humanity has come this far since the Wright Brothers achieved flight 122 ye...
item.description: It always amazes me that humanity has come this far since the Wright Brothers achieved flight 122 years ago in 1903. We have so much farther to go. The next half of this decade will be wild. Humanity may even set foot on Mars.

item.title: @elonmusk: NEW: TSA whistleblower tells Nick Shirley he witnessed Somali people flying millions of dollars in c...
item.description: NEW: TSA whistleblower tells Nick Shirley he witnessed Somali people flying millions of dollars in cash in suitcases out of the country every week. "The smallest amount in a suitcase that I heard was like $750,000." "We would rack our heads all the time, like, 'Where are they getting this?' Where in the world are they getting this money?" Absolutely insane. Video:@nickshirleyy
